ref.div: Andreasson, F. P., Schmitz, B. & Spiegler, D. Stable isotopic composition (δ18O CO3 2-, δ13C) of early Eocene fish-apatite from Hole 913B: an indicator of the early Norwegian-Greenland sea paleosalinity. In Proc.
